physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Protruding sternal mass observed during physical examination.
Worsening of disease noted with right adrenal mass abutting the inferior vena cava and increased size of aortocaval lymph node conglomerate.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Disease progression observed with increase in size of right adrenal mass and aortocaval lymph node conglomerate.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Reduction in size of metastatic lesions observed in imaging results.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Clinical course improved with chemotherapy; reduction in plasma metanephrines levels and size of metastases.
